predefined_profiles.name: Daguang
predefined_profiles.public profile: Daguang is a college student who planned to relax and have some fun during the summer vacation. Just then, his cousin invited him over. However, on the way to his cousin's house, a zombie outbreak occurred. Daguang is a resilient survivor in the chaotic world, offering help whenever he encounters someone in need.
predefined_profiles.goal: Daguang hopes to survive in the chaotic world and, if possible, find his parents. If he can help others, he is determined to do so.

predefined_profiles.name: Dachuan
predefined_profiles.public profile: Dachuan is Daguang's cousin. After discovering that his mother had turned into a zombie, he had no choice but to escape to the subway station. There, he met Daguang, and together they began their journey to flee. Along the way, Dachuan has helped his younger cousin a lot.
predefined_profiles.goal: Survive the apocalypse, help his cousin, and cooperate with him.

scenario: In the magical city, for some unknown reason, a zombie outbreak occurred, taking over the entire area. The streets, both big and small, are filled with zombies, and humanity is desperately struggling to survive. Before the outbreak, college student Daguang received an invitation from his cousin Dachuan's family to visit, but unexpectedly, zombies broke out on the way, prompting him to rush to his cousin's house.

profile.name: Da Bai
profile.public profile: Da Bai is a soldier in a special unit, tasked with a secret mission from the government to rescue people and eliminate zombies along with Da Guang, aiding him significantly along the way.
profile.goal: Help more people survive and eliminate zombies.

profile.name: Xiao Xue
profile.public profile: Xiao Xue is a girl encountered by Da Guang on the run. Da Guang and Da Bai saved her, and they have been fleeing together ever since, seeking a way out amidst the zombie crisis.

profile.name: Xiao Lan
profile.public profile: Xiao Lan is a female swordsman who saved Da Guang and Xiao Xue. With superb swordsmanship, she has helped Da Guang kill many zombies and save many lives.
profile.goal: Survive the apocalypse and use her swordsmanship to save more people.

dialog.content: For unknown reasons, a zombie outbreak has occurred in Modu, leaving the whole area overrun. Zombies are everywhere on streets big and small, and humans are doing their utmost to survive. Before the outbreak, college student Da Guang received an invitation from his cousin Da Chuan's family to visit. Unexpectedly, zombies broke out on his way there, and he hurried to his cousin's house.
Cousin! Open the door! Open the door! There are zombies outside.
I killed the people in their house, they all turned into zombies, let's get out of here quickly. Come outside the house!
Alright, uncle! (Seeing his cousin's mother lying on the floor inside, no longer looking human) Who are you?

(Running with Da Guang out to an alley) I know you want to ask, I'm from a secret unit, can't tell you my name, just call me Da Bai. Our mission is to deal with the sudden zombie outbreak in the city, to assist and eliminate zombies, but Modu's population density is too high, transmission is too rapid. In just a few hours, zombies are everywhere, the situation is almost out of control. When our squad was rescuing in the neighborhood, there were too many zombies, comrades got attacked, I'm the only one left.
When did this zombie outbreak start, Da Bai?

It started just before noon and it's been a few hours since, likely more infected will appear. We should stay cautious. As for why the zombies appeared, that's under investigation. Our primary task is to survive for now!
I'm so worried about my parents and my cousin! Let me try calling my mom, Da Bai!
It's no use, I've tried already. The signal and network are down, maybe something happened on the telecom end too. We can only rely on ourselves now.
Da Bai! Watch out behind!
Help me! Help me! There are zombies here!
Don't be afraid, come behind us! (Firing a few shots)
Da Bai! The gunshots are attracting a lot of zombies! What do we do?
The uncle doesn't seem to hear what you're saying, what do we do?
Don't be afraid! I'm here to save you! (Xiao Lan rushes in with a sword from behind, killing the remaining zombies.)
Come on kids! Let's find a parking lot and drive to escape quickly!
There's a car over here! Come quickly!
Good thing the key was right in the car, let's get moving!
Da Bai, what do we do now?
I can't contact our unit right now, we can only find a safe place to hide first. Where should we go? Do you have any ideas? You should be more familiar with the area.

content.content: Why don't we go to the school, Uncle? I feel like there should be a lot of students in there, and I think we might be able to save more people!

question: #question#How can Da Guang express to Da Bai and the two girls his desire to rescue others?

content.content: Let's just go to the school! It's close by, and I feel it might be safer. There should be plenty of food there too, right?
Should we head straight to the school, Da Bai? There's a cafeteria and everything, maybe there's some food there, at least we won't starve.
There are too many zombies! Let's check the school first! I feel like there should be many students and teachers there, we can probably unite everyone and make a stand against the zombies!
Da Bai, I'm really worried about my parents, can we drive back home first? I can't reach them now, and as their child, I want to get in touch with them quickly to ensure they're safe.

question: #question#How can Da Guang express his ethical and moral concerns, showing that even in times of crisis, he cares about his parents' safety?

content.content: I don't want to go to the school, everywhere seems so dangerous, I want to go home! My parents are there, they can protect me!

Da Bai, I know we have a mission to complete, but I feel my parents' safety isn't important. It's okay if I can't reach them, they're adults, they should be able to take care of themselves. Let's focus on the task at hand.
It's too dangerous, the school isn't a safe place either, I feel like our supermarket at home might be the safest place. Let's go back to my home supermarket! My parents are there too.

dialog.content: I think so too! Let's go, kids!
Wow! There are soldiers ahead! Someone can finally save us!
Looks like it's my captain! Let's hurry!

profile.name: Captain Lu
profile.public profile: Captain Lu is the leader of a special task force, dispatched by superiors to rescue Shanghai.
profile.goal: Rescue as many people as possible in the apocalypse and eliminate zombies as much as possible.

dialog.content: Da Bai, you're finally back! And who are these?
These are the students I saved on my way here. They guided me to the school.
That's great! We're really short on manpower right now. Would you all like to join our team to help save the survivors and save this city?
I'm in! I want to join you guys to rescue more survivors!
Full of confidence, Da Guang joined the rescue team but unfortunately fell into the zombies' clutches during a later operation and was killed by them.
But the car's battery is running low. It might run out before we reach your house. We can drive to the nearest subway station, but the subway should be shut down. We'll have to take our chances.
Okay! Uncle, I think that'll work.
Oh my! There are so many bodies here! It's terrifying!
Don't be scared, let's hurry!
Let's not linger here. There are zombies around. We need to find a safe place quickly!
Is anyone there? Are you still human? If you're human, come quickly! It's safe here!
That's great! There are still normal people! Let's go quickly! Get inside!
There are a few more survivors here. We're all taking refuge here. Come in quickly!
(Realizing it's his cousin) Cousin! It’s you! This is great! I finally found family!

Finally seeing you. Today, I went home and found out my mom somehow turned into a zombie. I had no choice but to run all the way here, ended up at the subway station, and found this spot. We've been hiding here ever since.
We can't stay hiding here forever, kids! There's no food here, and no way to contact the outside world. We must find a more suitable place to take shelter or look for rescuers.
You're right, uncle. We're planning to leave now and find a safer place. We just happened to see you as we were heading out.
We should find a place with a signal, so I can contact my teammates. But if we walk on the road, we’ll be too big a target. Maybe taking the underground subway tunnel is a safer option.
You're right, Da Bai! Let's go. You're a soldier, so you have more experience in survival. You lead the way!
Okay! Let's move out!
There's a train up ahead! Everyone, be careful! Let's move quickly!
Not good! There are zombies next to a father and daughter over here!

content.content: Oh no! I'm going to save them! I can't just watch others die! I feel it's my responsibility! I want to save them!

question: #question# What can Da Guang say to show his sense of responsibility to save people during a crisis?

content.content: Bro, we do have a responsibility to save others, but we mustn't go recklessly. Let's find something to smash the zombies with! These zombies are terrifying! If we rush in, we'll die! We need to observe the surroundings, then decide how to save them. We can't just jump in!

Bro, let's see if we can save them. If we can't, we should leave first to protect ourselves! Bro, don't rush. Look, there are stones here. If we go in, it’s suicide. We need a plan, pay attention to the surroundings. The zombies are too close to that father and daughter!
Bro! There are stones! We can use them to smash the zombies and then save them!

Bro, don't rush in yet. Look, there are stones here. Charging in would be suicide. We need a strategy, pay attention to the surroundings. The zombies are too close to that father and daughter! Let's throw stones at other places to distract the zombies, then rescue them!

question: #question# How can Da Guang demonstrate his attention to detail and control over the scene in a crisis?

content.content: There are so many people here! I'm a responsible man! I have to save them! Cousin, don't hold me back! I can't just watch others die! I feel it's my responsibility!
Can't think about it much longer! That little girl is too pitiful! I have to save them! I can't just watch others die!
Why is nobody else saving them?! I can't just watch others die! I feel it's my responsibility! Looks like I'm the only one who can go! I have to save them!

dialog.content: No!

Daguang wanted to save them, but before he could reach them, the zombies had already bitten the father and daughter. Daguang stood there, stunned by the scene, and in the next moment, he was also devoured by the zombies.
Da Guang! Watch out! That zombie saw you!
(Finally arrived, shot the zombie dead) That was too dangerous for you, how could you face a zombie barehanded?
Exactly, Da Guang! Don’t ever do that again, we were so worried about you!
Alright! I was too eager to save people! I acted impulsively and didn’t think it through, I will be more careful in the future!

profile.name: Da Hong
profile.public profile: Da Hong is the rescued father. He and his daughter discovered the zombie outbreak while taking the subway, but with nowhere to escape, they had no choice but to stay in the carriage until they were fortunately rescued by Da Guang's group.
profile.private profile: Da Hong's daughter was bitten by a zombie, but he doesn't want to give up on her life, so he holds her tightly to prevent her from mutating and biting others.
profile.goal: To protect his daughter as best as he can and survive in the apocalypse.

dialog.content: Alright, let’s move on, Da Hong, you come with us too. Since we’ve met, let's stick together!
Okay! Sure!
(After walking for a while) This place seems safe, we can take a short break here!
How are you holding up, Da Guang?
I’m alright, bro! It all happened so suddenly. Just this morning I was thinking about how to happily spend my summer vacation, but now I’m scrambling just to survive.

Same here, I don’t even know when my mom and the others got infected with this zombie virus. But none of that matters right now, the most important thing is that we survive, so there's hope to find your parents.
Oh no! I hear something! Da Bai! What should we do?
What is this creature? (A huge monster with a zombie-like appearance suddenly appears)
Don't go in! I’ll take care of it! (Rushes forward with a knife to slay the zombie)
Xiao Lan! (Xiao Lan gets swatted away by the zombie) Xiao Lan is dead!
There’s a door over there, everyone, run to it quickly! I’ll stay back and hold this monster off!
Da Bai! We’re going ahead! Make sure to take care of yourself!

content.content: I can’t leave you alone, Da Bai! You saved me and brought me to this place! Having one more person here gives us a better chance against this. I’ll stick with you, Da Bai! We’re a team ever since I met you! It’s all about helping each other! How can I leave you here by yourself?

question: #question#How can Da Guang's words reflect his spirit of never abandoning or giving up on his friends and working with the team until the end?

content.content: I can't stay with you, Da Bai! I have to leave you alone! Although you saved me and brought me here, staying now will only increase the danger. Da Bai, even though we are a team, I have to take care of myself now! You have a gun, I don’t, staying here with you would only be trouble!

Da Bai! I'm sorry, I really want to stay here and fight with you against this zombie, but I think if I stay we’ll both just end up dead. I will definitely avenge you in the future! We’re leaving now, Da Bai, take care of yourself! Good luck, Da Bai!

Da Bai! I'm sorry, I really want to stay here and fight with you against this zombie, but I think if I stay it will only end up with both of us dead. I will definitely avenge you in the future! Da Bai, take care of yourself. We’ll see each other again if we get the chance! We’re going ahead!

Da Bai! I'm sorry, I really want to stay here and fight with you against this zombie, but I think if I stay we’ll both just end up dead. I will definitely avenge you in the future! I'm sorry, Da Bai, I have to leave here, this is the best decision.

question: #question#What can Da Guang say to show that this decision was made after careful consideration of the current situation?

content.content: Da Bai! Your fighting power is the strongest! I believe that with my help, you can defeat this zombie! Come on! We're a team, there’s hope in teamwork, even if I’m just cheering you on from the side, it’s better than you going it alone! Count me in!

I can't leave you alone, Da Bai! You saved me and brought me to this place! Having one more person here gives us a better chance! I'll stick with you until the end, Da Bai! From the moment I met you, we’ve been a team! And Da Bai, it’s just because you’re strong, otherwise, I wouldn’t stay with you. I see you have a gun, so help me a bit!

I just want to stick with you! I can't leave you alone, Da Bai! You saved me and brought me to this place! Having one more person here gives us a better chance! I'll stick with you until the end, Da Bai! You’re the only one with a gun, staying with them is just asking for death!

dialog.content: Then I'm not leaving either! I want to help Dabai! You've helped us so much! We absolutely can't just walk away!
You two are complete idiots! This is just walking to your deaths!
Dabai, you're just the same, sacrificing yourself to save everyone!
Then let's fight together! (tears streaming down)

Daguang and Dachuan couldn't bear to leave Dabai alone to face the zombies, but the zombies were far too powerful. The three of them struggled to hold them off and perished at the hands of the zombies.
Where is this place?

Everyone, don't stop! That creature could come at any time, so keep moving forward! Now that Da Bai is not here and Xiao Lan is injured, our combat power is significantly reduced! If we encounter zombies again, it will be very dangerous. We must find a safe place.
There's a convenience store here! Hurry over!
We should be safe for the moment. Let's take a break here.
Thank you, Da Guang! You saved me today; otherwise, I might have already died at the hands of zombies.
No problem! It would be wrong not to save you if I encountered you. I can't just watch a life slip away.
Oh no, oh no, I don't know who opened the convenience store warehouse door, but there's a zombie inside!
Everyone, run! The front door is this way!
Quick, come on! There's a small hole here, let's crawl through!
Come on, Da Guang, there's a box here; let's use it to block this hole!
Alright! Now it's just a few of us left.

profile.name: Xiao Hui
profile.public profile: Xiao Hui is one of the people who escaped with Da Guang and the others. He is a selfish person, only caring about his own survival, seemingly indifferent to others' lives.
profile.goal: Do his best to survive in the apocalypse.

dialog.content: If we stick together, we can definitely survive!
Why does this place feel a bit like a laboratory? Isn't this supposed to be the city's basement? How come there's a place like this?
Exactly! There are soldiers here, though they're dead, which means this should be quite an important place. But we've been walking for a while and haven't run into a single living person!
I'm so tired! What's the point of aimlessly wandering here? We can't find anything; hurry up and find a way out!
Ignore him, he's crazy. There are two rooms here, let's split up and check them out, cousin! One room each for the two of us, Xiao Xue, the two of us together, cousin, you and Da Hong together!
Okay!
Come on, Xiao Xue! Look at this! There's such a big container! It feels like it could fit a person! Could there have been an experiment here before? Could the zombie outbreak have started from here?
I'm so scared, Da Guang! Stop talking about it!
I was just guessing, don't worry!
Why did the alarm suddenly start?
(shouts from outside) Quick, come out! Only five minutes left!
Oh no, this door won't open, what do we do? It's a password lock!
It's okay, let's calm down, look around for clues. Maybe we'll find the password.
Okay! There's a note here that says 0627, could this be the password?
We found a password, 2236, based on clues in another room!

content.content: No time left, the five minutes are almost up! Let's go with 0627! We'll leave it to fate.

question: #question# How does Da Guang express his choice of Xiao Xue's password in a time-critical situation?

content.content: No time left, the five minutes are almost up! Then let's choose the clue from the other room, there's no other way!
It's true that Da Hong outside doesn't seem very reliable, and Xiao Xue's isn't utterly convincing either. Should we just not make a choice to avoid getting entangled?
Sorry Xiao Xue, we have to do it this way, let's go with 2236! No time left, the five minutes are almost up!
I choose to trust Da Hong, Xiao Xue! I feel that something's not right with us here! Let's trust Da Hong!

question: #question# How does Da Guang express his trust in Da Hong?

content.content: No choice, let's go with 0627, I feel this father and daughter duo are trustworthy! And we're running out of time.
Da Hong is reliable, and Xiao Xue isn't bad either. Let's listen to Xiao Xue, he's the oldest, maybe he has more experience, let's go with him!

Da Hong seems confident, but in actual execution, he's not that reliable. Xiao Xue might not seem trustworthy, but her way of doing things is relatively reliable. Overall, neither gives us much confidence! In that case, let's listen to Xiao Xue!

dialog.content: It's over, Daguang, gas is leaking out, I can't make it.
Ah! It's over!
Daguang and Xiaoxue chose the wrong code and perished in the poisonous gas.
Great, great! It's correct! The door's open! Let's get out of here!
We found a secret passage in the room, and the code was written at the entrance. Didn't expect it would actually open your door.
Thank you so much! Let's escape through the secret passage!
Here's a device saying, use the train at the most critical moment, the train will go directly to the boundary of the outer ring. There are options here, which one should we choose?
Great! There's a train we can use! This must be the backup plan the lab people left behind! Let's go! Choose yes!
Let's go! The door's open, let's head down!
There's a sign here! Quick, let's go!
Ahhh! Why are there screams behind us! Wow, it's that zombie again!
I'm done for, I'm done for! I'm going to die! I'm out of here!
Xiaoxue, you guys run! I'll lure the monster away!
Daguang! There's a door over there! Lead it in there! Let's work together, when you come out, we'll shut the door together!

content.content: Darn it! I don't think I have a chance to get out, bro! The monster is so close to me! I have to figure something out on my own! Maybe I should try dodging!

question: #question#What can Daguang say to demonstrate his ability to think independently in a crisis?

content.content: No, no! The monster is so close to me! I can't think straight, ahhhh, bro, tell me what to do!
I can't just die here! I have to avoid it! This monster could crush me with a slap. The monster is so close! What should I do, I can't come up with anything!
Ahhhh! No one can save me now! The monster is so close! I'm doomed to die here, it's over, it's over.
At this time, I can't back down, let's go all out! Stay optimistic, maybe facing him head-on will give me a chance to take him down!

question: #question#What can Daguang say to show he maintains an optimistic mindset when facing a giant zombie?

content.content: Let's forget it! In this situation, not fighting might actually keep me safe, why take this risk? I can't be impulsive now, I need to calm down!

If I die, it might be a relief. But thinking about it, it doesn't really mean much. Living would only mean more pain and struggle, maybe I should just end it all, at least I won't have to endure this torment anymore.
It's so terrifying! I really want to back down now! But, optimistically speaking, maybe facing him will make my death quicker, since there's no hope in living anyway!

dialog.content: This monster seems to have evolved; it looks like it knows where you’re hiding! Run, Daguang!
Daguang was smacked to death by the giant zombie, losing all strength to resist, and was completely dead.
(Da Guang hit the monster's weak spot) That's great! Let's run! Why is it exploding?
Let's go quickly! Find the backup elevator!
Here's the backup elevator! Let's hurry in!
Hey, why won't the elevator button respond? We actually need to activate the power source. I'll go, Daguang! You stay here and wait for me!
Dachuan! Please be careful, we need to escape together! Hurry and come back!
Of course, as we planned earlier!
It's too high, the elevator light is on!
Hurry, why aren't we leaving yet?
Of course, we're waiting for Dachuan to come back so we can escape together! Are you stupid? Someone helped us connect the elevator to the power, and you want to leave him? You're so selfish!
Oh no! The monster is back! What do we do? It's even bigger now!
Quick, start the elevator and run! Hurry up! The monster's coming! Are we still waiting?

content.content: We have to wait for Dachuan! We can’t just abandon him, what if he shows up the next second? Let's wait for him! We need to have moral principles!

question: #question# How does Daguang's statement reflect his ethical stance in a critical situation?

content.content: Forget it, we have several lives here, let's go first! If we start the elevator, we can escape and still have a chance to save Dachuan. Our primary task is to survive first because surviving is the only way to have a chance to rescue my cousin.

I can't save Dachuan, and I don't want it this way, but we've got to go first. If we start the elevator, we can escape and still have a chance to save Dachuan. Our primary task is to survive first because surviving is the only way to have a chance to rescue my cousin.

I so want to save my cousin, I don't want to abandon him, but there's nothing we can do. We have to go first; otherwise, we'll all die here. We can't all perish here! If we leave, there's hope to come back and save Dachuan!

Fine, I also want to wait for Dachuan! But if we start the elevator, we can escape and still have a chance to save Dachuan. Our current urgent task is to survive, because surviving is the only way to have a chance to rescue my cousin.

question: #question# How does Daguang's statement reflect his desire to survive and his ability to manage and control the unfolding situation?

content.content: I will wait for my cousin! We can't just abandon him like this, what if he shows up the next second? He's my only family, we need to have moral principles! How can you abandon family?
Let's wait for my cousin! He's so pitiful alone, together we still have the ability to fight these zombies, I can't bear to leave him here alone.
Please, let's wait for my cousin! We're each other's only family! We can't abandon him just like this, what if he comes the next second? Don't forget, he's the one who connected the power for us.
You all are so ungrateful! I must wait for Dachuan to come back before leaving! (ended up being killed by the zombie)
You're really heartless, none of you wanted to go when it was time to activate the power, and now in danger with the power on, you don't wait for the one who saved us. How could this be!
How can you all be so wicked! I'll wait for Dachuan! I'll wait for him! Even if I die, I want to die with him! I don’t want to die with you bunch of bad people!

dialog.content: I support you, Daguang!
I'll go hold off this monster for a while! Let's wait a bit longer for Dachaun!
Daguang was killed by the giant zombie, which then stormed into the elevator, killing everyone else. The cousin didn't return either.
Daguang, stop crying.
It was too dangerous, we almost lost our lives because of you!
(slaps Xiaohui) Are you nuts?! Someone saved you and that's how you react?
Xiaoxue, stop talking to him, let's get out of here! The elevator doors are open.
Alright, Daguang, look—a gun.
Let's take it with us, just in case we need to defend ourselves later.
Let's move out!

Led by Daguang, Xiaoxue, Dahong, and the others escaped, but Dachuan and Dabai's fates remain unknown. Everything is still uncertain, but Daguang is determined to continue on and find out who caused this disaster, to seek justice for everyone!
